title: Cicada (Zikade) and Ant (Ameise) (in-text plates, page 28) from Tierfabeln des Aesop (Aesop's Fables)
medium: Two from an illustrated book with thirty-five woodcuts (including woodcut cover, title page and ornamental initials)
dimensions: composition (cicada, irreg.): 1 1/4 x 1" (3.2 x 2.6 cm); composition (ant, irreg.): 1 5/8 x 1" (4.1 x 2.6 cm);  page: 13 x 9 1/16" (33 x 23 cm)
